items.short_desc: West Indies women hope to revive the pride of old in T20 World Cup starting February 21st.
items.asset_title: ICC Women's T20 World Cup - SWOT analysis: Team West Indies

items.short_desc: Jasprit Bumrah has not been in good form in recent times and has picked just one wicket in his last six ODIs
items.asset_title: Could it just be that Jasprit Bumrah is overrated in ODIs?

items.short_desc: India were whitewashed 0-3 in the ODI series and a few positives and negatives stood out from the series.
items.asset_title: New Zealand vs India: Major takeaways for India from ODI series loss

items.short_desc: As we inch closer to the 13th edition of the Indian T20 League, we give you five players who carry a unique record.
items.asset_title: Most not-outs in history of the Indian T20 League

items.short_desc: India were whitewashed 0-3 in the ODI series but Shreyas Iyer stood out with his exemplary run of form.
items.asset_title: Shreyas Iyer and India's silver lining
